Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2016 06:14PM raleighgirl wrote:  hi ladies!  I've been following this thread for over a year. I am 11 months pfc and today was the first day I have loved my hair since I lost it to chemo. I had almost waist length hair my entire life and I have had many days of tears, wishing it was back. Now, I am so happy to have enough that I can pin it back in clips on the sides. It actually is growing on me!(haha pun intended). I never post pictures(I don't even have a Facebook account) but I figured this might give someone hope that has just started their journey.
